LandingPage.hero_description: Algorithmic intelligence for your peace of mind. Facilitate regulatory compliance (FDA) and take total control over your operations.
LandingPage.features_card1_desc: AI analyzes your temperature logs and proposes suggestions for anomalies, to be validated by your team.
LandingPage.features_card2_desc: Intelligent reading of your floor staff notes.
LandingPage.features_card3_desc: The interface instantly adapts to the native language of your kitchen brigade.
LandingPage.philosophy_intro: Most management software offers static dashboards and dead data.
LandingPage.philosophy_vision: We offer a living workflow that helps you anticipate problems before they arise.
LandingPage.philosophy_pillar1_desc: Tracking health regulations and hygiene logs integrates naturally into your team's daily flow. Simple and frictionless.
LandingPage.philosophy_pillar2_desc: The algorithm helps you spot anomalies (temperatures, expiry dates, service notes) before they become hurdles. Leave the restaurant with a light mind.
LandingPage.philosophy_pillar3_desc: The system doesn't just archive your data: it proposes suggested corrective actions to guide you in case of a problem.
LandingPage.protocol_phase1_desc: Import of your existing menu and configuration of your alerts.
LandingPage.protocol_phase2_desc: Artificial Intelligence classifies each dish and suggests corrective actions.
LandingPage.protocol_phase3_desc: Generation of social media posts and logbook summaries in multiple languages.
LandingPage.features_card1_ai_suggestion: Check the compressor and move the meats immediately.
LandingPage.features_card3_source_text: Clean the cold zone of the fridges
LandingPage.features_card3_target_text: Limpiar la zona fría de las neveras
LandingPage.features_title: Tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour opérer, au même endroit.
LandingPage.f1_desc: Oubliez les carnets volants. La relève, les problèmes matériels et les incidents clients sont consignés, analysés et suivis par l'IA.
LandingPage.f1_ex1: Noter un problème d'équipement (ex: "Le frigo 2 fuit, réparateur appelé").
LandingPage.f1_ex2: Transmettre des consignes de service claires à l'équipe du soir.
LandingPage.f1_ex3: Consigner les incidents clients pour le suivi qualité.
LandingPage.f2_desc: Rive vous aide à repérer les anomalies de température et de processus, et suggère des pistes d'action pour faciliter votre conformité.
LandingPage.f2_ex1: Le frigo passe à 8°C : suggestion d'une action corrective "Isoler ou jeter les denrées à risque".
LandingPage.f2_ex2: Rappel automatique pour la vérification des huiles de friture.
LandingPage.f2_ex3: Procédures HACCP documentées en cas d'inspection.
LandingPage.f3_desc: La barrière de la langue n'existe plus. Chaque membre accède à l'application et aux notes dans sa langue natale.
LandingPage.f3_ex1: Le chef écrit en espagnol, le plongeur lit en bengali.
LandingPage.f3_ex2: Fiches de recettes immédiatement comprises par tous les nouveaux arrivants.
LandingPage.f3_ex3: Procédures de sécurité acquises quelle que soit l'origine de l'employé.
LandingPage.integrations_banner: Integrates natively with your POS systems: Toast, Square, SumUp, Stripe, Lightspeed, Zettle...
LandingPage.f4_desc: Rive connects to your POS to cross-reference your sales volumes with your costs in real-time. Maximize your profits without lifting a finger.
LandingPage.f4_ex1: Automatically import your sales from Toast, Square, SumUp, Zettle, or Lightspeed.
LandingPage.f4_ex2: Identify your "Cash Cow" vs "Dead Weight" dishes with the intelligent Matrix.
LandingPage.f4_ex3: Incompatible system? Rive's AI natively parses and imports any CSV export.
LandingPage.f5_desc: Stop entering invoices manually. The AI extracts line items, products, and quantities granularly to update your net costs per pound.
LandingPage.f5_ex1: Take a picture of the supplier's crumpled invoice upon delivery.
LandingPage.f5_ex2: Granular line-by-line extraction and price variation alert on an ingredient.
LandingPage.f5_ex3: Automatic and live update of your recipes' Food Cost.
LandingPage.f6_desc: Attirez de nouveaux clients avec des publications engageantes générées en un clic à partir de vos menus.
LandingPage.f6_ex1: Générer un post accrocheur pour le menu Saint-Valentin avec emojis et hashtags.
LandingPage.f6_ex2: Traduire automatiquement un post pour attirer la clientèle touristique locale.
LandingPage.f6_ex3: Rédiger une description alléchante pour votre plateforme de livraison (Uber Eats/Deliveroo).
LandingPage.f7_desc: Sync all your reservations from Libro, Resy, and Zenchef in real time. Automatic webhooks and polling — zero manual entry.
LandingPage.f7_ex1: Receive new Libro reservations instantly as soon as guests book online.
LandingPage.f7_ex2: Consolidate all evening covers, cancellations, and no-shows in a single dashboard.
LandingPage.f7_ex3: Cross reservation data with your prep lists to fully anticipate each service.
LandingPage.f8_desc: Cross your reservations, POS sales, and recipes to automatically generate the exact quantities to prep before each service.
LandingPage.f8_ex1: Calculate portions for each dish based on exact confirmed cover count.
LandingPage.f8_ex2: Aggregate raw ingredients needed by crossing your recipes with historical sales data.
LandingPage.f8_ex3: Estimate total prep cost before even opening the kitchen.
